!Harkilgamed: The Kamael, once created, fell short of their expectations. A dagger is only a dagger, after all. It does not suddenly become something more. The Giants then fashioned the sharpest sword and the msot powerful cannon ever created, but even with their help the kamael were of limited help. And yet your race has survived. Why is that? [Quest _236_SeedsOfChaos 32236_07e.htm|Because we are weak?]
